mil7.2.6:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kummassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.2.6:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, kummo udakacaro udakeyeva vāsaṃ kappeti;
mil7.2.6:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbapāṇabhūtapuggalānaṃ hitānukampinā mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ pharitvā viharitabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo udake uppilavanto sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā yadi koci passati, tattheva nimujjati gāḷhamogāhati ‘mā maṃ te puna passeyyun’ti;
mil7.2.6:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesesu opatantesu ārammaṇasare nimujjitabbaṃ gāḷhamogāhitabbaṃ ‘mā maṃ kilesā puna passeyyun’ti.
mil7.2.6:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo udakato nikkhamitvā kāyaṃ otāpeti;
mil7.2.6:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nisajjaṭṭhānasayanacaṅkamato mānasaṃ nīharitvā sammappadhāne mānasaṃ otāpetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo pathaviṃ khaṇitvā vivitte vāsaṃ kappeti;
mil7.2.6:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lābhasakkārasilokaṃ pajahitvā suññaṃ vivittaṃ kānanaṃ vanapatthaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ pavivittamogāhitvā vivitte yeva vāsaṃ upagantabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo cārikaṃ caramāno yadi kañci passati vā, saddaṃ suṇāti vā, soṇḍipañcamāni aṅgāni sake kapāle nidahitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto tiṭṭhati kāyamanurakkhanto;
mil7.2.6:10.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbattha rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu āpatantesu chasu dvāresu saṃvarakavāṭaṃ anugghāṭetvā mānasaṃ samodahitvā saṃvaraṃ katvā satena sampajānena vihātabbaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ anurakkhamānena.
mil7.2.6:10.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.6:10.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare kummūpamasuttante—
